version.author: Rock Kennedy
version.changelog: - Updated Slider 4 logic to specific "Center Up 1, Top Up 2" behavior.

version.author: Rockumk
version.changelog: - New default channels for easier playing

version.author: Rock Kennedy
version.changelog: + CRITICAL: Removed recursive logic that caused Stack Overflow crashes on long tracks. + Optimization: Added MIDI_DisableSort for significantly faster generation. + Safety: Localized all variables.

version.author: Rock Kennedy
version.changelog: Colors Now Applied on First Run

version.author: Rock Kennedy
version.changelog: Fixed bug where user closing interface caused error Fixed bug where no open project caused error Auto Reload of Last Numbers2Notes Session

version.author: Rock Kennedy
version.changelog: Required an older version of imgui.

version.author: Rock Kennedy
version.changelog: # Fixes & Improvements + Fixed Shift/Ctrl modifier keys in the Entry tab (improved Mac & Caps Lock compatibility). + Fixed Diatonic highlighting errors in the Music Theory engine. + Fixed potential crash in Spectrum generation on long tracks. + Fixed duplicate sample song entry.

version.author: Rock Kennedy
version.changelog: # Major Update 1.3.1 + Restored full dependency installation via ReaPack. + Added "numbers2notes_config.lua" for easier user customization. + Added "N2N_Chooser.jsfx" for flexible track routing. + Implemented Plugin Audit system to check for required VSTs/JSFX on launch. + Internal refactoring to remove hardcoded track variables.

version.author: Rock Kennedy
version.changelog: # Major Update 1.3.2 + Restored full dependency installation via ReaPack. + Added "numbers2notes_config.lua" for easier user customization. + Added "N2N_Chooser.jsfx" for flexible track routing. + Implemented Plugin Audit system to check for required VSTs/JSFX on launch. + Internal refactoring to remove hardcoded track variables. + Updated numbers2notes_config.lua

version.author: Rock Kennedy
version.changelog: # Major Update 1.4.5 + Added Groove + Changed Drum Arranger to Drum Arranger.jsfx

version.author: Rock Kennedy
version.changelog: + Fixed color dupe bug. + Used region colors which matched Drum Arranger.

reapack.name: .PlaceHolder.lua
reapack.desc: Place Holder to prompt creation of the User Folder
